text: Vajira Ranaweera (18 December 1968 - 28 April 2020) was a Sri Lankan cricketer. He played in 96 first-class matches for the Sri Lanka Police Sports Club between 1995 and 2007, taking more than 250 wickets, and he also spent time as the team's captain. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1968 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Sri Lankan cricketers Category:Sri Lanka Police Sports Club cricketers Category:Place of birth missing
title: Vajira Ranaweera
